title: shankaram abhirAmi
sahitya:
shankaram abhirAmI manOharam shashidharam amrta ghaTEshvaram 
bhajEham shankAbhiSEka gAtram saccidAnanda mAtram


caraNam   pankajAsnAdi pUjitAbja padam bhakta mArkaNDEy-AyuSpradam 
bhayankara ghOra rUpadhara yama nigrahAnugraham 
pankajamukha guruguha paripAlam krpAlavAlam
			(ciTTasvara)
S n d p P m g s G||, S g s m g p m d p n|| s G s n d p m p N d|| p m g s s G s g m p n||
s n d p g m n d p m g s||g n s g m p g m p n s g|| m G S n D  P m g|| , S p n s g m p n s g||
